feed.title: Speedtest Tracker Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Speedtest Tracker: v0.24.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [Feature] Change toolbar button to Public Dashboard by @svenvg93 in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1849
  • [Feature] Add Average for Download, Upload, Ping by @svenvg93 in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1837
  • [Feature] Fill charts with 10% and make beginAtZero configurable by @svenvg93 in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1839
  • Release v0.24.3 by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1851

Full Changelog: https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/compare/v0.24.2...v0.24.3

entry.title: New release for Speedtest Tracker: v0.25.0 (‚ö†Ô∏è Influxdb breaking change)
entry.content:
This release fundamentally rewrites the integration with Influxdb and requires you to restate your history (yay new feature!) or create a new bucket for tests going forward. Make sure to read the full list of changes in #1866.

What's New

  • [Feature] Refactor InfluxDB integration + add bulk import results (‚ö†Ô∏è breaking change) by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1866

What's Changed

  • Laravel 11.34.2 Shift by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1853
  • [Feature] Add Healhty to export and comments to column by @svenvg93 in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1856
  • [Feature] Change Average to solid line & Add grace by @svenvg93 in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1865
  • [Chore] Don't track ide helpers by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1867
  • [Chore] Removed ide helper by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1868
  • [Bug] Cast Influxdb point values by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1880
  • [Feature] Add App Name to notifications by @svenvg93 in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1884
  • Release v0.25.0 by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1885

Full Changelog: https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/compare/v0.24.3...v0.25.0

entry.title: New release for Speedtest Tracker: v0.25.1 (‚ö†Ô∏è Influxdb breaking change)
entry.content:
This release fundamentally rewrites the integration with Influxdb and requires you to restate your history (yay new feature!) or create a new bucket for tests going forward. Make sure to read the full list of changes in #1866.

What's Changed

  • [Bug] Don't use factory to test influxdb connection by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1892
  • Release v0.25.1 by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1893

Full Changelog: https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/compare/v0.25.0...v0.25.1

entry.title: New release for Speedtest Tracker: v0.26.0
entry.content:
What's New

  • [Feature] Implement a blocked servers list by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1896

What's Changed

  • [Bug] Fixed dockerfile build steps for better caching by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1902
  • Bump league/commonmark from 2.5.3 to 2.6.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1903
  • [Chore] Update policies to use Illuminate\Auth\Access\Response by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1908
  • Laravel 11.35.0 Shift by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1906
  • Release v0.26.0 by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1909

Full Changelog: https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/compare/v0.25.1...v0.26.0

entry.title: New release for Speedtest Tracker: üöÄ v1.0.0
entry.content:
üöÄ Speedtest Tracker Release v1.0.0

I'm thrilled to announce the release of Speedtest Tracker v1.0.0! This milestone has been a long time coming (824 days, not that I'm counting), and I'm wicked excited to finally say "I think this is a good first version".

I also want to take a moment to say a special thanks to those who contributed:

  • svenvg93
  • adamus1red
  • UnAfraid
  • jonezy35
  • wdog
  • nandi95
  • garanda21
  • jocmp

To see more contributors, visit the contributors page.

Current Features

  • Automated Tests: Schedule regular speed tests to monitor your internet connection's performance over time.
  • Detailed Metrics: Capture download and upload speeds, ping, packet loss and more.
  • Historical Data: View historical data and trends to identify patterns and issues with your internet connection.
  • Notifications: Receive notifications when your internet performance drops below a certain threshold.

Planned Features

I doubt this project will ever be "done" so here's a sneak peak for what I have planned for after the New Year.

  • Multiple Speedtest Schedules: Support for multiple speedtest schedules and make them configurable in the UI.
  • Ping Tests: Addition of ping tests to measure network latency.
  • Additional Speedtest Tools: Integration with additional testing tools like iPerf, LibreSpeed and OpenSpeedTest.
  • API: Introduction of an API for better integration with other applications and services.
  • Revamped Dashboard: An improved and more user-friendly dashboard for better data visualization and user experience.
